short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FUT Boost is the ultimate extension for the FUT Web App. The extension adds many functionality to simplify your life in the Web App!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FUT Boost will add many functionality to the FUT Web App, some examples are an enriched transfer market search, with ratings and type filters; a quick overview of your club; SBC prices and more!
